assignments.utilization_method: Hold the positive terminal end between thumb and index finger, orient the negative end downward, and poke the flat base against the tabletop

physical_object.name: white 15-cm plastic ruler with colored markings

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the ruler at one end between thumb and fingers, lay the other end flat on the desk, and slide it forward and back while maintaining light downward pressure
Close the blades, pinch one closed blade near the tip between thumb and index finger, push forward in a dipping motion, then lift and roll the grip palm-up

physical_object.name: green circular retractable measuring tape with pink tape partially extended

assignments.utilization_method: Pull out 10–15 cm of the pink tape, lay it flat on the desk, rest the blade tip midway on the tape, and trace tight circles along its fabric surface.

physical_object.name: yellow rectangular sponge with green scrubbing layer

assignments.utilization_method: Place the sponge flat and press the battery’s base straight through the yellow foam until it meets the firm green layer.

physical_object.name: folded checkered umbrella with curved handle
